titles.title: Lord you are more precious than silver

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
Verse 1
Lord You are
More precious than silver
Lord You are
More costly than gold
Lord You are
More beautiful than diamonds
And nothing I desire
Compares with You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord your love
Is wider than the ocean
Lord your love
Is deeper than the sea
Lord your love
Encompasses the nations
There's nothing else
I want inside of me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord You are
More precious than silver
Lord You are
More costly than gold
Lord You are
More beautiful than diamonds
And nothing I desire
Compares with You
